abstract.shortdesc: The add-on provides a basic interface to .
abstract.note: The add-on requires version 20.1 or later.

conbody.p: The add-on supports cloning repositories, staging and committing locally, pushing changes to remote repositories, pulling updates from remote branches, using submodues, previewing the history of a branch, and resolving merge conflicts.
You can use the add-on by means of the view available in 's Author Mode. For more information about Author Mode views, see the topic.
